text: ‘‘nim'ma dharmada anuyayigala horatu bere yarannu nambabedi’’ (endu avaru heluttare). Nivu heliri; ‘‘allahanu torisida margave khacita sanmargavagide. Adannu avanu (hindom'me) nimage nididante berobbarigu nidaballanu. Athava nim'modeyana bali avarannu nim'ma virud'dha saksiyagisaballanu’’. Heliri; anugrahavu khandita allahana kaiyallide. Avanu adannu tanicchisidavarige dayapalisuttane. Allahanu tumba visalanu jnaniyu agiddane’’
